item.title: A Tiny LLM That Calls Itself
item.description: A tiny local LLM writes code to scrape a website, then calls itself to summarize what it found.

item.title: Fine-Tuning a Local LLM with LoRA
item.description: Train TinyLlama to know its favorite color using LoRA fine-tuning.

item.title: Hello World Python AWS Lambda
item.description: Step by step tutorial to create a AWS Python Lambda function.
